Look up the definition, pronunciation (both UK and US), and find one example sentence for the word \"altruism\" in the Cambridge Dictionary.
user_action_and_explanation: type "altruism" into the search bar with the placeholder text 'Search English—Chinese (Traditional)' to find the definition, pronunciation, and example sentence.
observation: The definition of "altruism" is shown as "willingness to do things that bring advantages to others, even if it results in disadvantage for yourself." The UK pronunciation is /ˈæl.truː.ɪ.zəm/ and the US pronunciation is /ˈæl.tru.ɪ.zəm/. An example sentence is: "She's not known for her altruism."
